alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Beadle; Brule; Davison; Hanson; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 04 at 10:44AM MST until January 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Higher snow amounts north of Interstate 90. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 9 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Beadle; Brule; Davison; Hanson; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn
